queries.description: Reading from uninitialized indeterminate values may produce undefined behavior.
queries.name: All memory shall be initialized before it is read

A8-5-0.title: All memory shall be initialized before it is read.

queries.description: Passing a class object with uninitialized data or padding bytes can cause information to be unintentionally leaked.
queries.name: Avoid information leakage when passing a class object across a trust boundary

DCL55-CPP.title: Avoid information leakage when passing a class object across a trust boundary

queries.description: Reading from uninitialized indeterminate values may produce undefined behavior.
queries.name: Do not read uninitialized memory
